tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Sridevi first creates a friendly/homely atmosphere as we enter. She then examines and suggests the right treatment depending on the condition of the tooth.
She suggested root canal treatment for one of the tooth for my 14yr old younger son. Dr. Rhea performed the root canal treatment very efficiently and then Dr. Chiranjeevi Reddy fixed the cap to the tooth. All the doctors handled and spoke to my son in a nice way, making him feel comfortable.
Thanks to all the doctors and Ivory dental.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback. We're happy that you liked Ivory Dental experience. We're committed for the same in the future as well.

review: My problem has been resolved completely, I had broken teeth where food was stuck and troubling. visited another dentist - Dental concerns, who just did filling without any basic checks not sure though but because of this i got an deep infection and had to get the RCT done. my college scared me that it's very painful and repetitive process.. so i didn't visit any dentist for a month. then after checking the reviews for ivory dental clinic i made my mind. i am happy I took right decision it was completely painless and thank both doctors who did RCT and cap fixing. you can definitely and completely trust Drs here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Chiranjeevi Reddy is a humble, highly profession doctor. I had tooth ache and i want to do root canal treatment as the pain was unbearable. I consulted him at 6.pm and he fixed an appointment with expert on root canal treatment. He prescribed pain killer till then. However, the tooth pain did not reduce and i messaged him about it around 8.30 PM. He responded immediately to my message and understood my pain and arrange for root canal treatment by 10.pm as the expert was engaged with other patient. I reached his clinic around 10 and with in 30-40 min the expert did excellent surgical procedure and i was absolutely fine after that with no pain. It is highly difficult to find professionals like this. Of note, the hygienic they follow during this pandemic  is highly appreciated. 
Thank you
reply_text:
Thank you for the kind feedback sir
Team Ivory Dental assures to give you the best dental treatment every time you visit us. We are glad you liked your experience with us.
Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello Everyone,
I met Dr Chiranjeevi Reddy in the year 2010 one of my visit to a Dental clinic in my neighborhood. Every time for my dental issues I used to visit him, on one of my follow up visits to him, I was told he had set up his own clinic. I did not get his contact details from the clinic nor could I find his contact details on the Internet. So, I started visiting other dentists for my dental issues, but could not find any Dentist who gave the treatment like Dr Chiranjeevi Reddy. So I decided to look for Dr Chiranjeevi Reddy again.
Thanks to Practo, I could get Dr Reddy's contact details in 2019. I was very happy to get his contact details and more happier when I visited him and got the treatment. Even after 9yrs he could recognize me.
About his new clinic,
1.	His staff is very courteous and as professional as Dr Reddy
2.	All your calls to the clinic are answered. Missed calls are promptly returned by the staff
3.	Appointments are honored. Also very minimal waiting time
4.	All doctors at the clinic are very helpful.
5.	You get advice according to your dental condition and not according to cost of the treatment
6.	Cost of treatment is reasonably priced.
7.	Clinic is very neatly and cleanly maintained

This clinic is ideal for anyone having Dental issues and I strongly recommend you consider this clinic for your dental treatment.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your such a elaborate and valuable feedback.
We're happy that you liked Ivory Dental experience.
We're committed for the same in the future as well.
thank you so much
